__e: Do you remember Murray making a phone call at 5:00 A.M.?
Agent Murray has a few questions for you, asked if I could bring you in.
Well, Murray said this whole place is kind of like a team thing.
Well I don't. Not personally, but, I know what Murray would want, and if it was an accident, he wouldn't want his friend locked up in jail forever, right?
Listen. Mrs. Murray's here if you need anything...
We don't talk to the Murrays, or they to us.
Mrs. Murray, I don't think you understand-- this is good news.
I wanted one three hours ago, but you said Murray wouldn't let us.
